data.lyric:
[ti:Starlight (Taylor’s Version)]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:Red (Taylor's Version)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Starlight (Taylor’s Version) - Taylor Swift (泰勒·斯威夫特)
[00:00.18]Lyrics by：Taylor Swift
[00:00.36]Composed by：Taylor Swift
[00:00.54]I said "Oh my what a marvelous tune"
[00:04.04]It was the best night never would forget how we moved
[00:08.33]The whole place was dressed to the nines
[00:11.84]And we were dancing dancing
[00:14.80]Like we're made of starlight
[00:17.48]
[00:18.70]Like we're made of starlight
[00:21.39]
[00:26.37]I met Bobby on the boardwalk summer of '45
[00:32.77]
[00:33.76]Picked me up late one night out the window
[00:36.54]We were 17 and crazy running wild wild
[00:41.41]Can't remember what song it was playing when we walked in
[00:45.78]
[00:47.32]The night we snuck into a yacht club party
[00:51.29]Pretending to be a duchess and a prince
[00:55.58]And I said "Oh my what a marvelous tune"
[00:59.31]It was the best night never would forget how we moved
[01:03.47]The whole place was dressed to the nines
[01:07.03]And we were dancing dancing
[01:10.05]Like we're made of starlight starlight
[01:13.39]
[01:14.03]Like we're made of starlight starlight
[01:18.18]
[01:23.47]He said "Look at you
[01:24.71]Worrying too much about things you can't change
[01:30.14]
[01:30.86]You'll spend your whole life singing the blues
[01:33.74]If you keep thinking that way"
[01:37.31]
[01:38.45]He was trying to skip rocks on the ocean saying to me
[01:44.58]"Don't you see the starlight starlight
[01:48.17]Don't you dream impossible things"
[01:52.56]Like "Oh my what a marvelous tune"
[01:56.39]It was the best night never would forget how we moved
[02:00.61]The whole place was dressed to the nines
[02:03.99]And we were dancing dancing
[02:07.26]Like we're made of starlight starlight
[02:10.62]
[02:11.22]Like we're made of starlight starlight
[02:14.88]
[02:16.08]Ooh ooh he's talking crazy
[02:19.95]Ooh ooh dancing with me
[02:23.67]Ooh ooh we could get married
[02:27.53]Have ten kids and teach 'em how to dream
[02:32.44]
[02:48.56]Oh my what a marvelous tune
[02:51.61]It was the best night never would forget how we moved
[02:55.88]The whole place was dressed to the nines
[02:59.24]And we were dancing dancing
[03:02.47]Like we're made of starlight starlight
[03:05.78]
[03:06.45]Like we're made of starlight starlight
[03:10.31]Like we're made of starlight starlight
[03:13.45]
[03:13.99]Like we dream impossible dreams
[03:18.57]Like starlight starlight
[03:21.61]Like we dream impossible dreams
[03:25.58]Don't you see the starlight starlight
[03:28.78]
[03:29.29]Don't you dream impossible things
data.trans:
[ti:Starlight (Taylor’s Version)]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:Red (Taylor's Version)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.18]//
[00:00.36]//
[00:00.54]我说 天呐 多么曼妙的曲调啊
[00:04.04]永远都不会忘记我们如何在那个最美妙的夜晚一同舞动
[00:08.33]我们盛装打扮
[00:11.84]我们舞动着
[00:14.80]我们就像是那满天璀璨的星光
[00:17.48]
[00:18.70]我们就像是那满天璀璨的星光
[00:21.39]
[00:26.37]45年的那个夏天我和鲍比在海滨木板路相遇
[00:32.77]
[00:33.76]在窗外 接我出门 我们狂欢了一个晚上
[00:36.54]那时我们十七岁狂野又放纵不羁
[00:41.41]记不清当时我们偷偷溜进游艇派对时
[00:45.78]
[00:47.32]演奏的是哪首曲子
[00:51.29]佯装成一名女公爵和一个王子
[00:55.58]我说 天呐 多么迷人的曲调啊
[00:59.31]永远都不会忘记我们如何在那个最美妙的夜晚一同舞动
[01:03.47]我们盛装打扮
[01:07.03]我们舞动着
[01:10.05]我们就像是那满天璀璨的星光
[01:13.39]
[01:14.03]我们就像是那满天璀璨的星光
[01:18.18]
[01:23.47]他凝视你说你
[01:24.71]总是担心那些你无法去改变的事
[01:30.14]
[01:30.86]如果你总是这样黯然神伤 
[01:33.74]你会一辈子都在唱蓝调
[01:37.31]
[01:38.45]他尝试跳到海上的礁石 对我说
[01:44.58]你看到那满天闪烁的星光了吗？
[01:48.17]是否就像你的梦想那般遥不可及
[01:52.56]天呐 多么曼妙的曲调啊
[01:56.39]永远都不会忘记我们如何在那个最美妙的夜晚一同舞动
[02:00.61]我们盛装打扮
[02:03.99]我们舞动着
[02:07.26]我们就像是那满天璀璨的星光
[02:10.62]
[02:11.22]我们就像是那满天璀璨的星光
[02:14.88]
[02:16.08]他那昂扬的话语
[02:19.95]与我共舞
[02:23.67]我们能够步入婚姻的殿堂
[02:27.53]生十个孩子 教会他们如何勇敢做梦
[02:32.44]
[02:48.56]天呐 多么动人的曲调啊
[02:51.61]永远都不会忘记我们如何在那个最美妙的夜晚一同舞动
[02:55.88]我们盛装打扮
[02:59.24]我们舞动着
[03:02.47]我们就像是那满天璀璨的星光
[03:05.78]
[03:06.45]我们就像是那满天璀璨的星光
[03:10.31]我们就像是那满天璀璨的星光
[03:13.45]
[03:13.99]就像我们做着遥不可及的梦
[03:18.57]如同那星光一般 璀璨闪耀
[03:21.61]就像我们做着遥不可及的梦
[03:25.58]你看到那满天闪烁的星光了吗？
[03:28.78]
[03:29.29]是否就像你的梦想那般遥不可及
